verses.text: The \w mighty|strong="H0410"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \add even\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, hath \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w*, and \w called|strong="H7121"\w* the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* from the \w rising|strong="H4217"\w* of the \w sun|strong="H8121"\w* unto the going \w down|strong="H3996"\w* thereof.\f + \fr 50.1 \ft of…: or, for Asaph\f*
Out of \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*, the \w perfection|strong="H4359"\w* of \w beauty|strong="H3308"\w*, \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w shined|strong="H3313"\w*.

Our \w God|strong="H0430"\w* shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, and shall not keep \w silence|strong="H2790"\w*: a \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* shall \w devour|strong="H0398"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* him, and it shall be \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w tempestuous|strong="H8175"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* him.

He shall \w call|strong="H7121"\w* to the \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w* from \w above|strong="H5920"\w*, and to the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, that he may \w judge|strong="H1777"\w* his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.
\w Gather|strong="H0622"\w* my \w saints|strong="H2623"\w* together unto me; those that have \w made|strong="H3772"\w* a \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* with me by \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w*.

And the \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w* shall \w declare|strong="H5046"\w* his \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w*: for \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \add is\add* \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* himself. \w Selah|strong="H5542"\w*.

\w Hear|strong="H8085"\w*, O my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and I will \w speak|strong="H1696"\w*; O \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and I will \w testify|strong="H5749"\w* against thee: I \add am\add* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \add even\add* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.
I will not \w reprove|strong="H3198"\w* thee for thy \w sacrifices|strong="H2077"\w* or thy burnt \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w*, \add to have been\add* \w continually|strong="H8548"\w* before me.
I will \w take|strong="H3947"\w* no \w bullock|strong="H6499"\w* out of thy \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \add nor\add* he \w goats|strong="H6260"\w* out of thy \w folds|strong="H4356"\w*.

For every \w beast|strong="H2416"\w* of the \w forest|strong="H3293"\w* \add is\add* mine, \add and\add* the \w cattle|strong="H0929"\w* upon a \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w hills|strong="H2042"\w*.

I \w know|strong="H3045"\w* all the \w fowls|strong="H5775"\w* of the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*: and the wild \w beasts|strong="H2123"\w* of the \w field|strong="H7704"\w* \add are\add* \w mine|strong="H5978"\w*.\f + \fr 50.11 \ft mine: Heb. with me\f*
If I were \w hungry|strong="H7456"\w*, I would not \w tell|strong="H0559"\w* thee: for the \w world|strong="H8398"\w* \add is\add* mine, and the \w fulness|strong="H4393"\w* thereof.
Will I \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* the \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* of \w bulls|strong="H0047"\w*, or \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* of \w goats|strong="H6260"\w*?
\w Offer|strong="H2076"\w* unto \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w thanksgiving|strong="H8426"\w*; and \w pay|strong="H7999"\w* thy \w vows|strong="H5088"\w* unto the most \w High|strong="H5945"\w*:
And \w call|strong="H7121"\w* upon me in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of \w trouble|strong="H6869"\w*: I will \w deliver|strong="H2502"\w* thee, and thou shalt \w glorify|strong="H3513"\w* me.

But unto the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w saith|strong="H0559"\w*, What hast thou to do to \w declare|strong="H5608"\w* my \w statutes|strong="H2706"\w*, or \add that\add* thou shouldest \w take|strong="H5375"\w* my \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* in thy \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*?
Seeing thou \w hatest|strong="H8130"\w* \w instruction|strong="H4148"\w*, and \w castest|strong="H7993"\w* my \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w behind|strong="H0310"\w* thee.

When thou \w sawest|strong="H7200"\w* a \w thief|strong="H1590"\w*, then thou \w consentedst|strong="H7521"\w* with him, and hast been \w partaker|strong="H2506"\w* with \w adulterers|strong="H5003"\w*.\f + \fr 50.18 \ft hast…: Heb. thy portion was with\f*

Thou \w givest|strong="H7971"\w* thy \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* to \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*, and thy \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w* \w frameth|strong="H6775"\w* \w deceit|strong="H4820"\w*.\f + \fr 50.19 \ft givest: Heb. sendest\f*

Thou \w sittest|strong="H3427"\w* \add and\add* \w speakest|strong="H1696"\w* against thy \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*; \w thou|strong="H5414"\w* \w slanderest|strong="H1848"\w* thine own \w mother’s|strong="H0517"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*.

These \add things\add* hast thou \w done|strong="H6213"\w*, and I kept \w silence|strong="H2790"\w*; thou \w thoughtest|strong="H1819"\w* that I was \w altogether|strong="H1961"\w* \add such an one\add* as thyself: \add but\add* I will \w reprove|strong="H3198"\w* thee, and set \add them\add* in \w order|strong="H6186"\w* before thine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*.

Now \w consider|strong="H0995"\w* this, ye that \w forget|strong="H7911"\w* \w God|strong="H0433"\w*, lest I tear \add you\add* in \w pieces|strong="H2963"\w*, and \add there be\add* none to \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w*.

Whoso \w offereth|strong="H2076"\w* \w praise|strong="H8426"\w* \w glorifieth|strong="H3513"\w* me: and to him that \w ordereth|strong="H7760"\w* \add his\add* \w conversation|strong="H1870"\w* \add aright\add* will I \w shew|strong="H7200"\w* the \w salvation|strong="H3468"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.\f + \fr 50.23 \ft that…: Heb. that disposeth his way\f*
